original_title: Depeche Mode: 1989–90 “If You Wanna Use Guitars, Use Guitars…”
overview: "If You Wanna Use Guitars, Use Guitars…" -  A 32-minute short film, entitled Depeche Mode 1989–90 (If You Wanna Use Guitars, Use Guitars), featured interviews with the band, Daniel Miller, Flood, François Kevorkian (who mixed the album), Anton Corbijn (who directed the music videos and did the album's photography/cover), and others. It also includes news footage from the infamous "riot" in Los Angeles, which gave the band media publicity the day before Violator came out.
tagline: If You Wanna Use Guitars, Use Guitars…
